examples.user_story: As a registered user, I want to log in with my email and password so that I can access my account

test_cases.title: Successful login with valid credentials
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the login page AND has a registered account
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to dashboard AND session is created

test_cases.title: Login fails with invalid password
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the login page
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Invalid credentials' is displayed AND user remains on login page

test_cases.title: Login fails with non-existent email
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the login page
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Account not found' is displayed

test_cases.title: Empty fields validation
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the login page
test_cases.expected_result: Validation error messages are displayed for empty fields

test_cases.title: Login with only email field filled
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the login page
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Password is required' is displayed

test_cases.title: Login with only password field filled
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the login page
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Email is required' is displayed

test_cases.title: Login with invalid email format
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the login page
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Please enter a valid email' is displayed

test_cases.title: Login with email containing special characters
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the login page
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Please enter a valid email' is displayed

test_cases.title: Login with extremely long password
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the login page
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Password exceeds maximum length' is displayed OR invalid credentials message

test_cases.title: Login with spaces in email field
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the login page
steps: Enter email with leading/trailing spaces (e.g., ' user@example.com ')
test_cases.expected_result: System trims spaces AND user is successfully logged in

test_cases.title: Login case sensitivity for email
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the login page AND has account with 'User@Example.com'
test_cases.expected_result: User is successfully logged in (email is case-insensitive)

test_cases.title: Session timeout after successful login
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in AND session timeout is set to 5 minutes
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to login page AND session message 'Session expired' is shown

examples.user_story: As a customer, I want to add items to my shopping cart so that I can purchase multiple products

test_cases.title: Add single item to empty cart
test_cases.preconditions: User is viewing a product page AND cart is empty
test_cases.expected_result: Item is added to cart AND cart count shows 1 AND success message appears

test_cases.title: Add multiple quantities of same item
test_cases.preconditions: User is viewing a product page
test_cases.expected_result: Cart shows 3 units of the product AND total price is calculated correctly

test_cases.title: Add item when out of stock
test_cases.preconditions: Product is marked as out of stock
steps: Attempt to click 'Add to Cart' button
test_cases.expected_result: 'Add to Cart' button is disabled AND message 'Out of Stock' is displayed

test_cases.title: Add multiple different items to cart
test_cases.preconditions: User is on product listing page
steps: Navigate to product 1 and click 'Add to Cart'
Navigate to product 2 and click 'Add to Cart'
Navigate to product 3 and click 'Add to Cart'
test_cases.expected_result: Cart count shows 3 AND all three products appear in cart with correct prices

test_cases.title: Add item with zero quantity selected
test_cases.preconditions: User is viewing a product page
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Please select a quantity greater than 0' is displayed

test_cases.title: Add item with negative quantity
test_cases.preconditions: User is viewing a product page
steps: Enter negative number in quantity field
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Quantity must be positive' is displayed

test_cases.title: Add item exceeding maximum stock
test_cases.preconditions: User is viewing a product with 10 units in stock
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Only 10 units available' is displayed

test_cases.title: Add item with maximum available quantity
test_cases.preconditions: User is viewing a product with 10 units in stock
test_cases.expected_result: All 10 units are added to cart AND success message appears

test_cases.title: Cart persistence after page refresh
test_cases.preconditions: User has added items to cart
test_cases.expected_result: Item remains in cart AND quantity is unchanged

test_cases.title: Add same item multiple times increases quantity
test_cases.preconditions: User has one item in cart
steps: Add same product again with quantity 2
test_cases.expected_result: Cart shows single product entry with total quantity 3 AND price is updated

test_cases.title: Add item with decimal quantity
test_cases.preconditions: User is viewing a product page
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Quantity must be a whole number' is displayed

test_cases.title: Cart total updates correctly after adding items
test_cases.preconditions: User is viewing products with known prices
steps: Add item priced at $10 with quantity 2
Add item priced at $15 with quantity 1
test_cases.expected_result: Cart total displays correctly as $35 AND breakdown is accurate

examples.user_story: As an admin, I want to delete user accounts so that I can remove inactive or banned users

test_cases.title: Successful account deletion
test_cases.preconditions: Admin is logged in AND viewing user management page
steps: Click delete on a user account
test_cases.expected_result: User account is removed from database AND confirmation message appears

test_cases.title: Cancel deletion operation
test_cases.preconditions: Admin initiates account deletion
test_cases.expected_result: Account remains unchanged AND user is returned to management page

test_cases.title: Cannot delete own account
test_cases.preconditions: Admin is viewing their own account
steps: Attempt to click delete button on own account
test_cases.expected_result: Delete button is disabled OR error message prevents deletion

test_cases.title: Delete user with active sessions
test_cases.preconditions: Admin is logged in AND user has active session
steps: Click delete on user account with active session
test_cases.expected_result: User account is deleted AND active session is terminated

test_cases.title: Delete user with pending orders
test_cases.preconditions: Admin is logged in AND user has pending orders
steps: Click delete on user account with pending orders
test_cases.expected_result: Warning message 'User has pending orders' is displayed AND deletion is prevented

test_cases.title: Delete user and verify data removal from database
test_cases.preconditions: Admin is logged in AND viewing user management page
steps: Note user ID to be deleted
test_cases.expected_result: User record no longer exists in database AND search returns no results

test_cases.title: Bulk delete multiple users
test_cases.preconditions: Admin is logged in AND multiple users are selected
test_cases.expected_result: All three users are deleted AND confirmation message shows count deleted

test_cases.title: Cannot delete user without admin privileges
test_cases.preconditions: Non-admin user is logged in
test_cases.expected_result: Delete button is not visible OR access denied message is shown

test_cases.title: Delete user audit trail is recorded
test_cases.preconditions: Admin is logged in AND viewing audit logs
test_cases.expected_result: Audit log shows deletion event with timestamp AND admin name

test_cases.title: Deletion confirmation dialog displays user details
test_cases.preconditions: Admin is initiating user deletion
test_cases.expected_result: Dialog shows user name AND email address AND warning message

test_cases.title: Delete user removes associated files
test_cases.preconditions: Admin is logged in AND user has uploaded files
test_cases.expected_result: User's files are deleted from storage AND associated records removed

test_cases.title: Delete inactive user with no recent activity
test_cases.preconditions: Admin is logged in AND user has no activity for 12 months
steps: Select user with no recent activity
test_cases.expected_result: Inactive user is successfully deleted AND confirmation appears

examples.user_story: As a customer, I want to search for products by name or category so that I can find what I'm looking for quickly

test_cases.title: Search with single keyword
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the search page AND products with keyword exist
test_cases.expected_result: Search results display all products matching 'laptop' AND result count is shown

test_cases.title: Search with multiple keywords
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the search page
steps: Enter 'blue wireless mouse' in search field
test_cases.expected_result: Results show products matching all keywords OR products with best keyword match

test_cases.title: Search returns no results
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the search page
steps: Enter search term that has no matches (e.g., 'xyzabc123')
test_cases.expected_result: Message 'No products found' is displayed AND suggestions are provided

test_cases.title: Search with special characters
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the search page
steps: Enter special characters (e.g., '@#$%') in search field
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Invalid search characters' OR empty results are returned

test_cases.title: Search is case insensitive
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the search page AND product 'Laptop' exists
test_cases.expected_result: Results display products matching 'laptop' regardless of case

test_cases.title: Search with leading/trailing spaces
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the search page
test_cases.expected_result: System trims spaces AND search results are accurate

test_cases.title: Search filter by category
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the search page AND categories are displayed
test_cases.expected_result: Results show only mice in Electronics category

test_cases.title: Search with price range filter
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the search page
test_cases.expected_result: Results display only products within specified price range

test_cases.title: Search suggestions appear while typing
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the search page
test_cases.expected_result: Autocomplete suggestions appear AND show 'laptop', 'laptop bag', etc.

test_cases.title: Search with empty field
test_cases.preconditions: User is on the search page
test_cases.expected_result: Warning message 'Please enter search term' is displayed OR all products shown

test_cases.title: Search results can be sorted
test_cases.preconditions: User has search results displayed
test_cases.expected_result: Results are re-sorted by price in ascending order

test_cases.title: Search pagination works correctly
test_cases.preconditions: User has search results with more than 10 products
test_cases.expected_result: Page 2 displays products 11-20 AND pagination controls work

examples.user_story: As a user, I want to update my profile information so that my account details are current and accurate

test_cases.title: Update first name successfully
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in AND on profile edit page
test_cases.expected_result: First name is updated AND confirmation message appears AND page refreshes with new name

test_cases.title: Update email address
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in AND on profile edit page
test_cases.expected_result: Verification email is sent AND user is prompted to verify new email

test_cases.title: Update with invalid email format
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in AND on profile edit page
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Invalid email format' is displayed AND changes are not saved

test_cases.title: Update with email already in use
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in AND another account uses the email
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Email already in use' is displayed

test_cases.title: Update profile picture
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in AND on profile edit page
test_cases.expected_result: Image is uploaded AND displayed in profile AND success message shown

test_cases.title: Update profile with oversized image
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in AND on profile edit page
steps: Attempt to upload image larger than 5MB
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'File size exceeds 5MB limit' is displayed

test_cases.title: Update phone number
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in AND on profile edit page
steps: Enter phone number with correct format
test_cases.expected_result: Phone number is saved AND formatted correctly AND confirmation appears

test_cases.title: Update with invalid phone number format
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in AND on profile edit page
steps: Enter phone number with invalid format
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Invalid phone format' is displayed

test_cases.title: Update address information
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in AND on profile edit page
test_cases.expected_result: All address fields are updated AND confirmation message appears

test_cases.title: Update with empty required field
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in AND on profile edit page
steps: Clear a required field (e.g., first name)
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'This field is required' is displayed

test_cases.title: Cancel profile update without saving
test_cases.preconditions: User has made changes to profile
test_cases.expected_result: Changes are discarded AND original information is displayed

test_cases.title: Update personal bio
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in AND on profile edit page
steps: Enter bio text up to 500 characters
test_cases.expected_result: Bio is saved AND displayed on profile AND character limit enforced

examples.user_story: As a user, I want to reset my password so that I can regain access if I forget it

test_cases.title: Initiate password reset with valid email
test_cases.preconditions: User is on login page AND cannot remember password
test_cases.expected_result: Confirmation message appears AND password reset email is sent

test_cases.title: Password reset with non-existent email
test_cases.preconditions: User is on password reset page
test_cases.expected_result: Generic confirmation message appears (for security) AND no email sent

test_cases.title: Password reset link expires after time limit
test_cases.preconditions: User has received password reset email
steps: Wait for link to expire (24 hours)
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Link has expired' is displayed AND user must request new link

test_cases.title: Reset password with new valid password
test_cases.preconditions: User has valid password reset link
test_cases.expected_result: Password is updated AND user is redirected to login AND can login with new password

test_cases.title: Reset password with mismatched confirmation
test_cases.preconditions: User is on password reset form
steps: Enter different password in confirmation field
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Passwords do not match' is displayed

test_cases.title: Reset password with weak password
test_cases.preconditions: User is on password reset form
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Password too weak' AND password requirements are displayed

test_cases.title: Reset password cannot reuse old password
test_cases.preconditions: User is on password reset form
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Cannot reuse previous password' is displayed

test_cases.title: Password reset with empty new password field
test_cases.preconditions: User is on password reset form
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Password is required' is displayed

test_cases.title: Multiple password reset requests
test_cases.preconditions: User has requested password reset
test_cases.expected_result: Latest link is valid AND previous link is invalidated

test_cases.title: Password reset invalidates all active sessions
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in on another device
test_cases.expected_result: All previous sessions are terminated AND re-login is required

test_cases.title: Password reset with very long password
test_cases.preconditions: User is on password reset form
test_cases.expected_result: Password is accepted if within system limits OR error shown

test_cases.title: Password reset email not received
test_cases.preconditions: User requested password reset
test_cases.expected_result: User can request new reset email AND receives it

examples.user_story: As a customer, I want to view my order history so that I can track previous purchases

test_cases.title: View order history list
test_cases.preconditions: User is logged in AND has made purchases
test_cases.expected_result: All past orders are displayed with order number, date, AND total

test_cases.title: View order details
test_cases.preconditions: User is on order history page
test_cases.expected_result: Order details display items, quantities, prices, shipping address, AND order status

test_cases.title: Order history empty state
test_cases.preconditions: User with no purchases is logged in
test_cases.expected_result: Message 'No orders found' is displayed AND shop link is provided

test_cases.title: Filter orders by status
test_cases.preconditions: User is on order history page with multiple orders
test_cases.expected_result: Only delivered orders are displayed

test_cases.title: Filter orders by date range
test_cases.preconditions: User is on order history page
test_cases.expected_result: Orders within selected date range are displayed

test_cases.title: Search order by order number
test_cases.preconditions: User is on order history page
steps: Enter order number in search field
test_cases.expected_result: Specific order is displayed if found OR 'No results' message shown

test_cases.title: Order history pagination
test_cases.preconditions: User has 50+ orders
test_cases.expected_result: Pagination works AND 10 orders per page displayed

test_cases.title: Reorder from order history
test_cases.preconditions: User is viewing order details
test_cases.expected_result: All items from previous order are added to new cart

test_cases.title: View tracking information for shipped order
test_cases.preconditions: User is viewing shipped order details
test_cases.expected_result: Tracking number AND estimated delivery date are displayed

test_cases.title: Download order invoice
test_cases.preconditions: User is viewing order details
test_cases.expected_result: Invoice PDF is downloaded with order details AND items

test_cases.title: Return item from order
test_cases.preconditions: User is viewing delivered order AND within return window
test_cases.expected_result: Return request is created AND confirmation shown

test_cases.title: Cannot return order outside return window
test_cases.preconditions: User is viewing order delivered 60+ days ago
test_cases.expected_result: 'Return Item' button is disabled OR message 'Return window expired'

examples.user_story: As a shopper, I want to apply discount codes so that I can receive discounts on my purchases

test_cases.title: Apply valid discount code
test_cases.preconditions: User has items in cart AND valid code exists
test_cases.expected_result: Discount is applied AND cart total is reduced AND confirmation message shown

test_cases.title: Apply invalid discount code
test_cases.preconditions: User is on checkout page
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Invalid coupon code' is displayed

test_cases.title: Apply expired discount code
test_cases.preconditions: User is on checkout page AND code has expired
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Coupon has expired' is displayed

test_cases.title: Apply code with minimum purchase requirement
test_cases.preconditions: User has cart total below minimum requirement
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Minimum purchase of $50 required' is displayed

test_cases.title: Remove applied discount code
test_cases.preconditions: User has discount code applied
steps: Click remove button next to discount code
test_cases.expected_result: Discount is removed AND cart total reverts to original

test_cases.title: Apply percentage discount code
test_cases.preconditions: User has items in cart AND percentage code exists
test_cases.expected_result: 20% discount is calculated correctly AND applied to total

test_cases.title: Apply fixed amount discount code
test_cases.preconditions: User has items in cart AND fixed amount code exists
test_cases.expected_result: $10 is deducted from total AND reflected accurately

test_cases.title: Apply BOGO discount code
test_cases.preconditions: User has matching items in cart AND BOGO code exists
steps: Apply buy one get one code
test_cases.expected_result: Second item is free AND total correctly calculated

test_cases.title: Cannot apply same code twice
test_cases.preconditions: User has code applied
steps: Attempt to apply same code again
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Code already applied' is displayed

test_cases.title: Apply code with category restriction
test_cases.preconditions: User has items from restricted category in cart
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Code not applicable to items in cart' is displayed

test_cases.title: Stack multiple discount codes
test_cases.preconditions: User attempts to apply multiple codes
test_cases.expected_result: Only one code allowed OR both codes apply per policy

test_cases.title: Discount code case insensitive
test_cases.preconditions: User is on checkout page
steps: Enter code in lowercase when registered as uppercase
test_cases.expected_result: Code is accepted AND discount applied regardless of case

examples.user_story: As a user, I want to manage my notification preferences so that I receive only relevant communications

test_cases.title: Enable email notifications
test_cases.preconditions: User is on notification preferences page AND email is disabled
test_cases.expected_result: Email notifications are enabled AND confirmation message appears

test_cases.title: Disable SMS notifications
test_cases.preconditions: User is on notification preferences page AND SMS is enabled
test_cases.expected_result: SMS notifications are disabled AND confirmation message appears

test_cases.title: Select specific notification types
test_cases.preconditions: User is on notification preferences page
test_cases.expected_result: Selected preferences are saved AND user receives only selected notification types

test_cases.title: Set quiet hours for notifications
test_cases.preconditions: User is on notification preferences page
steps: Set time range 9 PM to 8 AM
test_cases.expected_result: Quiet hours are set AND notifications not sent during this time
